item.title: About Me
item.description: I have a lot of cum inside my balls

item.title: Skills
item.description: Programming> Programming # Languages I know: C++, C#, Kotlin, GLSL and OpenGL 4 Engines> Engines # Unity> Unity # I have multiple years of experience working with Unity on small-scale projects, and I’m highly proficient with C# programming inside of Unity.

item.title: Colorules
item.description: A game made in 5 days> A game made in 5 days # Colorules is a small game made in the Game Gen Game jam, by a team of 5 people.

item.title: Froggen
item.description: You are a frog with a very long tongue!> You are a frog with a very long tongue! # Froggen is a physics-based platformer where the main mechanic is having a long tongue.

item.title: Sweet Dreams
item.description: First University Project> First University Project # Sweet Dreams is a simple 2D scroll based platformer. It was made in the span of 5 months during the Projects class. I was the lead developer and graphic designer of the project.
